headline.main: Heaviest Weight of Bombs in History Rained on Hitler's Europe During March

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Thursday, April 1 -- Yesterday's pounding of the key convoy point of Rotterdam by American Flying Fortresses topped off the Allied aerial offensive for March, during which, observers estimated today, 15,000 tons of bombs were dropped on Nazi-occupied Europe.
abstract: Allied Mar aerial offensive revd; map of day-by-day record
